languages.text: {n}Вокс-синтезатор издает звук, похожий на вздох.{/n} "Данное утверждение истинно. Мои... дальнейшие действия не определены. Я провожу точечную диагностику памяти херетека Деменца, хотя протоколы чистоты велят искоренить его богохульное знание. Меня не влекут запретные сведения, лишь данные, касающиеся благословенного Амарната".

{n}A sigh-like sound comes from the vox-synthesiser.{/n} "This statement is true. I... am yet to settle into a definitive course of action. I am running a spot diagnostic on the memory of the heretek Dementz, even though purity protocols stipulate that his blasphemous knowledge must be eradicated. I am not drawn toward forbidden information, but only to data concerning the blessed Amarnat."
languages.original_text: {n}Вокс-синтезатор издает звук, похожий на вздох.{/n} "Данное утверждение истинно. Мои... дальнейшие действия не определены. Меня не влекут запретные сведения, лишь данные, касающиеся благословенного Амарната".

languages.text: {n}音阵合成器中传来了仿佛叹息般的声音。{/n}“这种说法是正确的。我……还没决定好接下来该如何行动。尽管根据纯洁协议规定，异端分子德曼兹掌握的亵渎性知识必须被根除，但我正在仔细检视他的记忆。我并没有被禁止的信息所吸引，我只是在检查与蒙福者阿玛纳特相关的内容。”
languages.original_text: {n}A sigh-like sound comes from the vox-synthesiser.{/n} "This statement is true. I... am yet to settle into a definitive course of action. I am running a spot diagnostic on the memory of the heretek Dementz, even though purity protocols stipulate that his blasphemous knowledge must be eradicated. I am not drawn toward forbidden information, but only to data concerning the blessed Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: {n}音阵合成器中传来了仿佛叹息般的声音。{/n}“这种说法是正确的。我……还没决定好接下来该如何行动。尽管根据纯洁协议规定，异教徒德曼兹掌握的亵渎性知识必须被根除，但我正在仔细检视他的记忆。我并没有被禁止的信息所吸引，我只是在检查与蒙福者阿玛纳特相关的内容。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Del voco sintetizador sale un sonido similar a un suspiro.{/n} «Esta declaración es verdadera. Aún no... he decidido un curso de acción definitivo. Estoy ejecutando un diagnóstico puntual de la memoria del heretek Dementz, aunque mis protocolos de pureza exigen la erradicación de su blasfemo conocimiento. No me atrae la información prohibida, sino los datos relacionados con el bendito Amarnat».
languages.original_text: {n}A sigh-like sound comes from the vox-synthesiser.{/n} "This statement is true. I... am yet to settle into a definitive course of action. I am running a spot diagnostic on the memory of the heretek Dementz, even though purity protocols stipulate that his blasphemous knowledge must be eradicated. I am not drawn toward forbidden information, but only to data concerning the blessed Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: {n}Del sintetizador de voco sale un sonido similar a un suspiro.{/n} «Esta declaración es verdadera. Aún no... he decidido un curso de acción definitivo. Estoy ejecutando un diagnóstico puntual de la memoria del heretek Dementz, aunque mis protocolos de pureza exigen la erradicación de su blasfemo conocimiento. No me atrae la información prohibida, sino los datos relacionados con el bendito Amarnat».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}ヴォクス・シンセサイザーからため息のような音が出る。{/n}「この言葉は真実だ。私は…まだ明確な行動方針を決めかねている。私は異端技術デメンツの記憶を個別に診断している。浄化プロトコルでは、彼の冒涜的な知識は根絶されなければならないと規定されている。私は禁断の情報には惹かれない。だが、祝福されたしアマルナトに関するデータは気にかかるのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}A sigh-like sound comes from the vox-synthesiser.{/n} "This statement is true. I... am yet to settle into a definitive course of action. I am running a spot diagnostic on the memory of the heretek Dementz, even though purity protocols stipulate that his blasphemous knowledge must be eradicated. I am not drawn toward forbidden information, but only to data concerning the blessed Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴォクス・シンセサイザーからため息のような音が出る。{/n}「この言葉は真実だ。私は…まだ明確な行動方針を決めかねている。私は異端技術デメンツの記憶を個別に診断している。浄化プロトコルでは、彼の冒涜的な知識は根絶されなければならないと規定されている。私は禁断の情報には惹かれない。だが、祝福されたしアマルナトに関するデータは気にかかるのだ」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ein Geräusch wie ein Seufzen ertönt aus dem Vox-Synthesizer.{/n} "Diese Aussage ist korrekt. Ich ... habe mich noch nicht für einen definitiven Weg entschieden. Ich lasse gerade den Speicher des Häretekten Dementz analysieren, obwohl die Reinheitsprotokolle vorschreiben, dass sein blasphemistisches Wissen ausgelöscht werden muss. Ich interessiere mich nicht für verbotene Informationen, lediglich für Daten über den gesegneten Amarnat."
languages.original_text: {n}A sigh-like sound comes from the vox-synthesiser.{/n} "This statement is true. I... am yet to settle into a definitive course of action. I am running a spot diagnostic on the memory of the heretek Dementz, even though purity protocols stipulate that his blasphemous knowledge must be eradicated. I am not drawn toward forbidden information, but only to data concerning the blessed Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein Geräusch wie ein Seufzen ertönt aus dem Vox-Synthesizer.{/n} "Diese Aussage ist korrekt. Ich ... habe mich noch nicht für einen definitiven Weg entschieden. Ich lasse gerade den Speicher des Häretekten Dementz analysieren, obwohl die Reinheitsprotokolle vorschreiben, dass sein blasphemistisches Wissen ausgelöscht werden muss. Ich interessiere mich nicht für verbotene Informationen, lediglich für Daten über den gesegneten Amarnat."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Son synthétiseur-vox émet un son proche du soupir.{/n} « Cette affirmation est exacte. Je n'ai... pas encore décidé de ce que j'allais faire. J'ai lancé un diagnostic sur la mémoire de l'hérétek Dementz, bien que les protocoles de pureté exigent l'éradication pure et simple de son savoir blasphématoire. Je ne suis pas à la recherche d'informations interdites, mais de données concernant Amarnat le béni. »
languages.original_text: {n}A sigh-like sound comes from the vox-synthesiser.{/n} "This statement is true. I... am yet to settle into a definitive course of action. I am running a spot diagnostic on the memory of the heretek Dementz, even though purity protocols stipulate that his blasphemous knowledge must be eradicated. I am not drawn toward forbidden information, but only to data concerning the blessed Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: {n}Son synthétiseur-vox émet un son proche du soupir.{/n} « Cette déclaration est vraie. Je n'ai... pas encore décidé de ce que j'allais faire. J'ai lancé un diagnostic sur la mémoire de l'hérétek Dementz, bien que les protocoles de pureté exigent l'éradication pure et simple de son savoir blasphématoire. Je ne suis pas à la recherche d'informations interdites, mais de données concernant Amarnat le béni. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}A sigh-like sound comes from the vox-synthesiser.{/n} "This statement is true. I... am yet to settle into a definitive course of action. I am running a spot diagnostic on the memory of the heretek Dementz, even though purity protocols stipulate that his blasphemous knowledge must be eradicated. I am not drawn toward forbidden information, but only to data concerning the blessed Amarnat."

languages.text: {n}Voks sentezleyiciden iç çekişe benzer bir ses geliyor.{/n} "Bu önerme doğru. Üzerinde karar kıldığım kesin bir eylem planı henüz bulunmamakta. Arındırma protokolleri onun kâfirce irfanının yok edilmesini şart koşuyor olsa da tekâfir Dementz'in belleği üzerinde bir bölge tanısı yapıyorum. Yasaklı bilgileri edinmeye meyilli değilim, kutsanmış Amarnat'la ilişkili verileri edinmeye meyilliyim."
languages.original_text: {n}A sigh-like sound comes from the vox-synthesiser.{/n} "This statement is true. I... am yet to settle into a definitive course of action. I am running a spot diagnostic on the memory of the heretek Dementz, even though purity protocols stipulate that his blasphemous knowledge must be eradicated. I am not drawn toward forbidden information, but only to data concerning the blessed Amarnat."

traits.locale_text: {n}Voks sentezleyiciden iç çekişe benzer bir ses geliyor.{/n} "Bu önerme doğru. Üzerinde karar kıldığım kesin bir eylem planı henüz bulunmamakta. Arındırma protokolleri onun kâfirce irfanının yok edilmesini şart koşuyor olsa da, tekâfir Dementz'in belleği üzerinde bir bölge tanısı gerçekleştirmekteyim. Yasaklı bilgiye meyilli olmam sebebiyle değil, kutsanmış Amarnat'la ilişkili veriler sebebiyle."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
